question: Recent surveys show increased interest in relocation and travel to other countries. What may be the reasons for this trend, and what will be the possible outcome from this behavior? Provide examples for your opinion.
text: Globalization has expanded the boundaries of business beyond the person's ability. Current survey has revealed that, preference of changing the place and travel around the globe is increasing continually. Acquiring better knowledge and business are the main reason of this trend. This essay will highlight the possible outcomes of this approach in the upcoming paragraphs below.

On the one hand side, there are many reasons for people to move to another place for leaving. The prime reason is better employment opportunity. This is because a person always seeks to get a well-paid job, thus, people prefer to do job in large metropolitan sectors, where they can get better reward, than their own native place. Another reason is that , in today’s era travelling another countries is also becoming popular among the people, as everyone has their own purpose to travel, some go about acquiring knowledge of different places and some go for enjoying mind-set. For example, according to a new survey in India, most of the people migrate to new a country due to high currency rate.

On the other hand side, as every garden has weeds as well. Moving to other countries has also arisen some problem for people, such as environment and food. For instance, the majority of the children face food poisoning problems. Secondly, people are adapting western life style and they also forget about their own culture, which is also a negative intellectual development of a person. For instance, people who migrate to another place often face problems in their own rituals, while an event.
In conclusion- seeking of getting a good job opportunity manipulate people to dislocate their area. However, it also has some incalculable impact own person further life.
